project.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST04-DT05-DF05-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST04-DT05-DF05-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2951 -s 31 -m "asdfasdf" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-SUBV-07-ST04-DT05-DF05-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 2951 -s 31 -m "this string has an another t" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
